rows.label: qst202101_0010
rows.name:
Amazing, amazing! This
is a huge discovery!

rows.label: qst202101_0020
rows.name: Waah! [ML:Dash ]You surprised me.

rows.label: qst202101_0030
rows.name:
Listen to this! It's truly the
discovery of the century.

rows.label: qst202101_0040
rows.name: H-Hey, calm down, Shiki.

rows.label: qst202101_0050
rows.name: What on earth happened?

rows.label: qst202101_0060
rows.name:
Huh? Ah[ML:Dash ] Sorry. I got a
little carried away[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202101_0070
rows.name:
Actually, I was investigating
the Tomes of Mors we've
collected so far, but[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202101_0080
rows.name:
When I deciphered all four
volumes, lo and behold[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202101_0090
rows.name: Lo and behold?

rows.label: qst202101_0100
rows.name: Lo and behold!

rows.label: qst202101_0110
rows.name:
The location where an
ancient stone tablet is
hidden has been revealed!

rows.label: qst202101_0120
rows.name:
That's kinda roundabout[ML:Dash ] You
deciphered the books and
that's all you found out?

rows.label: qst202101_0130
rows.name:
Now, now, isn't it fine? That's
just how people of the past are.

rows.label: qst202101_0140
rows.name:
Um, this ancient stone tablet,
what kind of thing is it?

rows.label: qst202101_0150
rows.name:
Since the books are called
"Tomes of Mors", after all...

rows.label: qst202101_0160
rows.name: I think it's written about Mors.

rows.label: qst202101_0170
rows.name:
In other words, it's a stone tablet
packed with ancient knowledge.
Truly a treasure of humanity.

rows.label: qst202101_0180
rows.name:
How about it? You're
interested now, aren't you?

rows.label: qst202101_0190
rows.name:
Let's go search for the stone
tablet together with me!

rows.label: qst202101_0200
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]That sounds interesting. Let's go, Rex.

rows.label: qst202101_0210
rows.name:
You're interested in the
stone tablet too, Homura?

rows.label: qst202101_0220
rows.name:
Yes. Because, doesn't treasure
hunting make you excited?

rows.label: qst202101_0230
rows.name:
I guess so. Then, let's
get ready and head out[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202101_0240
rows.name: You mean it?

rows.label: qst202101_0250
rows.name:
Yeah, yeah. I knew you
guys would say that.

rows.label: qst202101_0260
rows.name:
Alright, strike while the iron is
hot. Let's head out immediately.

rows.label: qst202101_0270
rows.name: No, like I said, first the preparations[ML:Dash ]
